article_title: Best of the Web Today: No True Believer
article_text:
"Let's be clear about ISIL," President Obama declared yesterday after it was confirmed that the terrorist group (known as ISIS in our stylebook) had murdered American journalist Jim Foley by decapitation.

The president kept his promise of clarity only for a few sentences: "They have rampaged across cities and villages--killing innocent, unarmed civilians in cowardly acts of violence. They abduct women and children, and subject them to torture and rape and slavery. They have murdered Muslims--both Sunni and...

twitter.description: Obama's ISIS illogic leads him in surprising directions, James Taranto writes.
